verses.text: And the angel that talked with me came again, and waked me, as a man that is wakened out of his sleep,

And said to me, What seest thou? And I said, I have looked, and behold a candlestick: all \add of\add* gold, with a bowl upon the top of it, and its seven lamps, and seven pipes to the seven lamps, which \add were\add* upon the top of it.
And two olive-trees by it, one upon the right \add side\add* of the bowl, and the other upon the left \add side\add* .
So I answered and spoke to the angel that talked with me, saying, What \add are\add* these, my lord?
Then the angel that talked with me answered and said to me, Knowest thou not what these are? and I said, No, my lord.
Then he answered and spoke to me, saying, This \add is\add* the word of the LORD to Zerubbabel, saying, Not by might, nor by power, but by my spirit, saith the LORD of hosts.

Who \add art\add* thou, O great mountain? before Zerubbabel \add thou shalt become\add* a plain: and he shall bring forth \add its\add* head-stone \add with\add* shoutings, \add crying\add* , Grace, grace, to it.
Moreover the word of the LORD came to me, saying,
The hands of Zerubbabel have laid the foundation of this house; his hands shall also finish it; and thou shalt know that the LORD of hosts hath sent me to you.

For who hath despised the day of small things? for they shall rejoice, and shall see the plummet in the hand of Zerubbabel \add with\add* those seven; they \add are\add* the eyes of the LORD, which run to and fro through the whole earth.
Then I answered, and said to him, What \add are\add* these two olive-trees upon the right \add side\add* of the candlestick and upon its left \add side\add* ?
And I answered again, and said to him, What \add are these\add* two olive branches which through the two golden pipes empty the golden \add oil\add* out of themselves?
And he answered me and said, Knowest thou not what these \add are\add* ? And I said, No, my lord.
Then said he, These \add are\add* the two anointed ones, that stand by the LORD of the whole earth.
